entries.meaning: (dated) A pyrotechnician: person skilled in the manufacture or setting off of fireworks and firework displays.
examples: That the Secretary of the Navy be, and he is hereby, authorized to appoint a pyrotechnist for the service of the navy,  […]

entries.meaning: (figurative) One who demonstrates a brilliant display, as of rhetoric or wit, or of virtuosity in the performing arts.
examples: "It is thus the pyrotechnist (should we say demiurge?) who gives meaning to the so to speak explosive effervescences that are weaving the world of the spectator"
